segments.text: No . I am Canadian . Are you Chinese ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to meet you , too . Let me show you around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , I will appreciate it . How long have you been here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About two years , but it seems as if I got here yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2
